pageDescription: Jochen Probst, senior software engineer working as freelancer for Web Application Development with javascript, React, express and node.js
experiences_description: The greyed out ones are the ones I did not work with for more than a year. The numbers are updated annually.
welcome_description: If you are looking for an experienced javscript / React developer working remote or close to Stuttgart, Germany, I might be the right person for you. I am also available for consulting.
welcome_introduction: I'm an opinionated full stack developer with a focus on frontend development in Typescript and React. I also have a lot of experience with backend development in javascript (Node.js, Express). I'm an advocate of agile software development for a long time and I love to work in small teams. I'm also a big fan of open source software and I contribute to open source projects.
